item.title: CVE-2024-6618|2024-08-13T16:37:41.654Z -- aveva -- reports%20for%20operations
item.description: In Ocean Data Systems Dream Report, a path traversal vulnerability could allow an attacker to perform remote code execution through the injection of a malicious dynamic-link library (DLL).
